A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie was incredible. It was visually stunning and kept me engaged the whole time. The acting was phenominal and there are some great moments in the film which I greatly appreciated. I only really have two big gripes: Throwaway characters. The purple hair woman (who's name ive forgotten) and the not-so master codebreaker were both characters who served one purpose and then disappeared promptly. My other issue was the need to have a codebreaker in the first place. It felt like a useless thread that lead no where. Overall I think its a great movie and I stongly recommend it.
